mapper.select: select count(1) from t_member_wallet_log log where log.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT log.member_id AS memberId, sum(log.change_money) AS totalBalance, sum( CASE WHEN log.change_money > 0 THEN log.change_money ELSE 0 END ) AS totalIncome, sum( CASE WHEN log.change_money < 0 THEN log.change_money ELSE 0 END ) AS totalExpense FROM t_member_wallet_log log where log.member_id = #{memberId}
